mapper.sql: BANK_CODE, BANK_NAME, BANK_LEVEL, UP_BANKCODE, ADMIN_FLAG, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, PHONE, FAX, STATUS, OPERATOR_BANKCODE, OPERATOR_CODE, UPDATEDATE, UPDATETIME, CERTNO, CERTENDDATE, CERTSTARTDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOP_BANKINFO ( BANK_CODE, BANK_NAME, BANK_LEVEL, UP_BANKCODE, ADMIN_FLAG, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, PHONE, FAX, STATUS, OPERATOR_BANKCODE, OPERATOR_CODE, UPDATEDATE, UPDATETIME, CERTNO, CERTENDDATE, CERTSTARTDATE )VALUES ( #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upBankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorBankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certenddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certstartdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update TOP_BANKINFO set BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , BANK_LEVEL = #{bankLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UP_BANKCODE = #{upBankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ADMIN_FLAG = #{adminFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , OPERATOR_BANKCODE = #{operatorBankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CERTNO = #{certno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CERTENDDATE = #{certenddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CERTSTARTDATE = #{certstartdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BANK_CODE = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
